entities.description: Most recent use of any drug with a needle.
Most recent use of crack, heroin, or meth with a needle.
Ever used a needle to inject heroin.
Ever used a needle to inject cocaine.
Ever used a needle to inject methamphetamine.

relationships.description: Indicates the most recent use of any drug with a needle by the respondent.
Indicates the most recent use of crack, heroin, or meth with a needle by the respondent.
Indicates whether the respondent has ever used a needle to inject heroin.
Indicates whether the respondent has ever used a needle to inject cocaine.
Indicates whether the respondent has ever used a needle to inject methamphetamine.
